entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
